predicate.note: Frames file for 'discontinue' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: Troubled NBI Inc. said [0] it fired more than half its work force and is discontinuing its hardware business [*-1] to focus on its software and service operations .
example.arg: [*-1] to focus on its software and service operations

example.name: passive
example.text: While the discussions between Delmed and National Medical Care have been discontinued [*-1] , Delmed will continue [*-2] to supply dialysis products through National Medical after their exclusive agreement ends in March 1990 , Delmed said [0] [*T*-3] .
example.arg: [*-1] -> the discussions between Delmed and National Medical Care

example.name: transitive with ArgM-LOC
example.text: A Kentucky Fried Chicken spokesman , however , disputed the notion that the delivery service experienced problems in some markets where testing has been discontinued [*-1] [*T*-2] .
